As part of your project you will give an approx. 10 minute presentation. To do this, you will have to develop some slides to present.

Quarto has a number of different options for [producing slide decks](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/). Below we will use [Revealjs](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/).
